2.text: Draw a curved line on the side of the top circle to represent the bunny’s nose.

3.text: Add almond shapes over the head for the ears.

5.text: Do the same “furry” effect on the sketched outline of the bunny’s body.

7.text: Draw a small circle for the head.

8.text: Sketch two small oblongs on the lower half of the circle for the cheeks.

9.text: Sketch a rough outline for the hands and feet.

10.text: Draw the eyes using small circles, add the nose by sketching an inverted triangle, sketch the mouth and add the tooth.

11.text: Darken the outline of the bunny’s body.

12.text: Add the bunny’s whiskers and two short lines on each of the bunny’s limbs.
